Nice to meet you!

About Me

Hi, there! I currently study as a Ph.D. student in Xiamen University, supervised by Prof Liaoni Wu, and Prof Yancheng You. I am interested with generation and utilization of synthetic images. I obtained my Master degree in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning from the University of Birmingham under the guidance of Prof Shuo Wang.
